extendedInfo.description: If you know the enemy, you can defeat it.All what you need to know about most common 22 drugs: effects, description, name, structureIn the app are present various drugs and related effects. Among them:- LSD- MDMA- Hashish- Marijuana- Cocaine - Heroinaand so on.Quiz section for test your skills and knowledge about effects!Lite version has some limitations about drug's consultation. For unlimited consultation you can buy Full version for a cheap charge

reviews.title: Too vague
reviews.comment: Doesnt give enough information and MDMA is the pure active ingredient in ecstasy, the street name for MDMA is mollies, MDMA and ecstasy r two different drugs
reviews.author: Kyle Lombardi

reviews.title: anth
reviews.comment: good for educational purposes , could be the future in health classes nationwide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Some of the questions in the quiz have the drug name in the question.  Some questions have the same answer repeated more than once and for some reason one will be wrong. Waste of time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BULLSPI!!!
reviews.comment: This app is hot garbage, you need to pay to learn anything about drugs people use
reviews.author: A Google User
